unnormalised: **Brand Collabs are the New Samosa: Everyone's Digging In!**
normalised: Brand Collaborations are the New Samosa: Everyone's Digging In!

unnormalised: Social media's buzzing louder than a Diwali celebration! Why? Brand collaborations are hotter than a plate of spicy Hyderabadi biryani right now. From micro-influencers in Mumbai promoting local saree brands to massive campaigns featuring Bollywood stars endorsing everything from chai to cars, it's everywhere!
normalised: Social media's buzzing louder than a Diwali celebration! Why? Brand collaborations are hotter than a plate of spicy Hyderabadi biryani right now. From micro-influencers in Mumbai promoting local saree brands to massive campaigns featuring Bollywood stars endorsing everything from chai to cars, it's everywhere!

unnormalised: Remember when Neha Kakkar partnered with Paytm? Epic! And now, everyone's scrambling to get in on the action. We're seeing collaborations focusing on everything from eco-friendly Ganesh Chaturthi decorations to promoting safe Holi celebrations.
normalised: Remember when Neha Kakkar partnered with Paytm? Epic! And now, everyone's scrambling to get in on the action. We're seeing collaborations focusing on everything from eco-friendly Ganesh Chaturthi decorations to promoting safe Holi celebrations.

unnormalised: Apparently, a recent study by IIM Bangalore showed a 30% rise in brand engagement from influencer marketing during festival season. Brands are realizing that consumers trust recommendations from people they follow, making these collabs worth every single Rupee. Even your chacha's kirana store is probably thinking about getting on Instagram! So, get ready for more sponsored content than you can shake a stick at. The brand collaboration train is leaving the station! Next stop: Your feed.
